description: Learn how to use simple clothing items for spontaneous bondage and BDSM scenes. Lee Harrington shows you how to turn even the most basic attire into rigorous restraints and tools for humiliation or punishment. From take-down scenes to objectification and fetishism, discover how to convert a variety of clothes into effective blindfolds, hoods, gags, arm sleeves, mitts, strait jackets, wrist cuffs, sex-assisting devices, mummy bags, strap-on harnesses, and so much more!
title: Using Clothing for Spontaneous Bondage & Play
